name: Actio Reactio
description:
This is my entry "Actio Reactio" for the Azure Lux Game Jam 2021 for the theme "Chain Reactions", my first game jam ever :)

It's a physics based puzzle game consisting of 8 levels. The goal is to get the golden ball to the goal by placing different objects in and then simulating the scene.

Hope you enjoy!

PS 1: You can rotate objects manually by CTRL + Left clicking on them after they were placed.

PS 2: There's a playground level at the end where you can place everything yourself ^^ If you create something interesting with it don't hesitate to share it :D
